mapper.insert: INSERT INTO notice(num, userId, subject, content, notice, hitCount, showNotice, reg_date) VALUES(#{num}, #{userId}, #{subject}, #{content}, #{notice}, 0, #{showNotice}, SYSDATE)
mapper.select: SELECT n.num, notice, n.userId, userName, subject, hitCount, TO_CHAR(reg_date, 'YYYY-MM-DD') reg_date, NVL(fileCount, 0) fileCount FROM notice n JOIN member1 m ON n.userId=m.userId LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT num, COUNT(*) fileCount FROM noticeFile GROUP BY num ) f ON n.num=f.num WHERE notice = 1 AND showNotice = 1 ORDER BY num DESC
SELECT NVL(COUNT(*), 0) FROM notice n JOIN member1 m ON n.userId=m.userId

SELECT n.num, notice, n.userId, userName, subject, hitCount, reg_date, showNotice, NVL(fileCount, 0) fileCount FROM notice n JOIN member1 m ON n.userId=m.userId LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT num, COUNT(*) fileCount FROM noticeFile GROUP BY num ) f ON n.num=f.num
ORDER BY num DESC OFFSET #{offset} ROWS FETCH FIRST #{size} ROWS ONLY
SELECT num, n.userId, userName, subject, content, reg_date, hitCount, notice, showNotice FROM notice n JOIN member1 m ON n.userId=m.userId WHERE num = #{num}
mapper.update: UPDATE notice SET hitCount=hitCount+1 WHERE num = #{num}
mapper.select:
SELECT num, subject FROM notice n JOIN member1 m ON n.userId=m.userId
AND (num > #{num})
ORDER BY num ASC FETCH FIRST 1 ROWS ONLY

SELECT num, subject FROM notice n JOIN member1 m ON n.userId=m.userId
AND (num < #{num})
ORDER BY num DESC FETCH FIRST 1 ROWS ONLY
